features: 【100% Natural Bamboo wine racks】This durable and sturdy natural bamboo wine rack is prepared for eco-friendly lifestyle. Two layers of non-toxic protective paint applied enable it to be better choice no matter for countertop or table top. With smooth texture and no peculiar smell, such a wine rack is perfect for home, kitchen, countertop, pantry, cabinet, dining room or wine cellar

【Save Space】The wine rack countertop holds up to 12 bottles, 3-Tier compact design allows it to save a lot of space and hold enough wine.Such ideal wine rack free standing for pantry for every wine lover! (Assembled Size: 17.6L×9.25W×11.8H inch)

【Easy to assemble】The installation instructions for wine rack and all accessories are provided. the steps are clear and simple, so you can assemble the wine rack shelf quickly. one complete wine rack will bring you a happy DIY experience.

【Functional & Elegant】Elegant rack for wine storage and display, whether entertaining family and friends or coordinating the design of your home, these wine racks is the finest in style and convenience. Specially designed wave shelves hold all your bottles horizontally and securely and keep the corks fully moisturized so your wine stays fresh

【Various Uses】Freestanding wine rack with the compact and portable design that you can put anywhere in your home, even put in the pantry cabinet or put on the tabletop, floor. Whether you display your favorite wines in the kitchen, bar, dining room, or keep them in the cabinet. Also suitable for outdoor parties, cookout, lawn wedding, birthday party and Christmas party.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 12 Bottle Bamboo Wine Rack, 3-Tier Wine Storage Racks Countertop, freestanding wine shelf cabinet Organize Great for Your Home Décor This wine racks free standing floor is more geared toward the decorative side than towards the actual business of large-scale storage. If you love cooking with wine, it would be nice to store wine in with this small wine rack. That way, you could use this wine shelf in the kitchen, on a table or anywhere you have some extra space. As wine lovers we know to keep bottles stable and keep the corks fully moisturized so that your wine stays fresh, this wine stand holder can make each bottle is accessible and well-protected.

Polished edge care We use the finest craftsmanship during producing, two protective paint layers make sure that the bamboo materials reserve their own color while being non-toxic to your health and your wine. 3-tier Stable Wine Bottle Shelf This wine rack 3-tier can store 12 bottles of wine, elegant rack for wine storage and display, accent any home, kitchen, countertop, cabinet, dinning room, basement or bar table, it is the best choice for you to store wine. The load-bearing capacity of each layer of the wine rack can be up to 50 lb. Wine Bottles Neck Slot Design The wine bottle fits perfectly with the wine rack to prevent the wine bottle from shaking and slipping, ensuring that your wine is safe and stable.

Specification Item name: Natural Bamboo Wine rack countertop, Wine shelf storage display , Wine bottle holder free standing floor.Capacity: 12 Bottles of wine.Material：100% Natural Bamboo.Assembled Size: 17.6L×9.25W×11.8H inch 3 Tiers. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Did not come with assembly instructions. I figured it out after trail and error

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's compact but still holds 12 bottles
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a small enough rack that would temporarily fit in a China hutch until I could drink the bottles I have in my wine chiller fridge. This size was perfect. Assembly was easier using a torx bit in my cordless then the final tightening with the supplied Allen wrench. They even provided an extra screw. Very Happy :):):)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it but
reviews.reviewText: One of the pieces cracked down the middle while putting it together, but it still functions so that’s good. For less than $20 they do the job. Fit perfectly under my shelving in the pantry and it looks so much nicer which is what I wanted

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased wine shelves from this company three times! My tip is to use a fresh bottle of wood glue when putting it together. It doesn’t move at all!!.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It does what it needs to, it's easy to put together if you are a bit crafty. The only instructions are the ones on the sales page. NONE are included in the box and the parts aren't labeled so you kinda have to use common sense to assemble.Other than that it's sturdy and I'm satisfied with how it holds my bottles of wine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very attractive and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: 5 min of assembly gave us a very good looking and sturdy wine rack. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were all pre drilled , directions were clear and simple. I put it together in a couple minutes, it was easy and even provided the little wrench. I’m a 75 year old lady and did this on my kitchen table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tricky to assemble
reviews.reviewText: It would be helpful to have more than 2 arms to put this together, looks great once complete.
